to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.accessorycommunication.command

Class AbstractCommandTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.accessorycommunication.command.AbstractCommandTestCase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdjustSpeedCommandTest, GetBatteryStateCommandTest, GetFeaturesCommandTest, GetProtocolVersionCommandTest, NoopCommandTest, RotateCameraCommandTest, TurnCarCommandTest

    public abstract class AbstractCommandTestCase
extends AndroidTestCase
    Abstract implementation for all command tests (All classes that extends AbstractCommand).
    Author:
    sven

      • verifyTest

        protected void verifyTest(byte[] expectedRequest)
        Verifies all mock that created by setUp(). Verifies that the response was read to the correct position. Verifies that the request was send as expected.
        Parameters:
        expectedRequest - The expected request bytes.

      • createArray

        protected byte[] createArray(byte[] start,
                 byte checksum)
        Creates a byte array for testing request commands or response messages with a length of 16 bytes.
        Parameters:
        start - Will be copied a the begin of the array
        checksum - Last element of the array (The checksum byte)
        Returns:
        Created array (all not filled byte will be 0x00)
